Hepatitis C
Hepatitis C is a virus that 
infects the liver. Many people 
will have no symptoms and 
be unaware that they are 
infected. If you have hepatitis 
C, there is a small risk that 
you could pass the infection 
5

to your baby. This cannot 
be prevented at present, 
as treatment for hepatitis C 
cannot be given in pregnancy,
